name: NanosMath
description: A table containing useful and aux Math functions.

static_functions.name: ClampAxis
static_functions.description: Clamps an angle to the range of [0, 360]

static_functions.name: NormalizeAxis
static_functions.description: Clamps an angle to the range of [-180, 180]

static_functions.name: RelativeTo
static_functions.description: Calculates the location and rotation relative to an actor

return.description: the location relative to the actor
the rotation relative to the actor

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location of the new system

parameters.name: rotation
parameters.description: The rotation of the new system

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: The actor to be translated to the new system

static_functions.name: FInterpTo
static_functions.description: Interpolate number from Current to Target

static_functions.name: RInterpTo
static_functions.description: Interpolate Rotator from Current to Target

static_functions.name: RInterpConstantTo
static_functions.description: Interpolate Rotator from Current to Target with a constant step

static_functions.name: VInterpTo
static_functions.description: Interpolate Vector from Current to Target

static_functions.name: VInterpConstantTo
static_functions.description: Interpolate Vector from Current to Target with a constant step
